title: shakti irukkudaDA
sahitya:
shakti irukkudaDA sahOdarA


anupallavi

  eddishaiyum pugazh EttiDum annaiyin


caraNam 1    uttamar nenjinilE avaL UnruvAL kanjamalar
porppinilE iruppAL avaL ponnaDi en muDiyE
    caraNam 2    aruL vizhiyAnavaLE shakti aDiyavar tuNai avaLE
iruL oLi shuDar avaLE shakti engilum uLLavaLE
    caraNam 3    tOL vali IvALE shakti sutantara dEvi avaL
kIzhmai aghaTriDuvAL nATTin kIrti perukkiDuvAL
    caraNam 4    tattuvam kaDandavaLE shakti tanip-poruLAnavaLE
shuddha vaDivinaLE aruL toNDil iruppavaLE
